name: Endless Dungeon (itch) (ovo6)
description:
My very first game maker game to learn stuff.

You control two heroes to solve puzzles in rooms to open door to next level. When in the last room you start again with higher difficulty - more monsters.

Controls are : 

Player 1:  arrow keys + enter to attack/action

Player 2: WASD + left CTRL to attack/action

Enjoy!
